cause.description:
Mobile SPCA Office 620 Zeigler Circle West Mobile, Alabama 36608 just west of the Greater Gulf State Fairgrounds
Open Tuesday through Saturday 10:00 am until 3:00 pm
THE MOBILE SPCA IS A NO-KILL ADOPTION GUARANTEE HUMANE SOCIETY SINCE 1885
1. to promote adoption of shelter and homeless animals and to end the deaths of healthy and treatable shelter animals by 2015
2. to provide humane care and treatment for the animals entrusted to us
3. to investigate animal cruelty and neglect
4. to spay and neuter all animals we offer for adoption; to promote and to aid financially spay/neuter in the community
5. to aid in rescuing animals in emergency situations
6. to assist in special financial animal-related hardship cases
7. to offer educational programs for children and adults
8. to treat all animals with respect.
cause.mission: Our mission is the prevention of cruelty to and the relief of suffering of animals.
cause.name: MOBILE SOCIETY FOR THE PREVENTION OF CRUELTY TO ANIMALS
